item.title: By: LYNN ASHTON
item.dc:creator: LYNN ASHTON
item.description: We will get together when the weather improves,I know Rob is waiting to make plans. My request is for my new Epson connected-we both looked at the instructions and agreed far beyond our ken!-when it can be managed. Keep safe.
item.content:encoded:
We will get together when the weather improves,I know Rob is waiting to make plans.
My request is for my new Epson connected-we both looked at the instructions and agreed far beyond our ken!-when it can be managed.
Keep safe.

item.title: By: Liz Ashton
item.dc:creator: Liz Ashton
item.description: Good to hear you're both okay in this weather. Edinburgh centre isn't so bad, lots of snow but not sticking. How are the cats enjoying the weather?
item.content:encoded: Good to hear you’re both okay in this weather. Edinburgh centre isn’t so bad, lots of snow but not sticking. How are the cats enjoying the weather?
